questions.text: The world's largest _____ weighs over 500 pounds.

Honey never _____.

The inventor of the frisbee was turned into a _____ after he died.

In Japan, there's a hotel staffed entirely by _____.

The name for the dot over the letters 'i' and 'j' is a _____.
